name: can-i-use
title: Can I Use
description: Can I Use provides up-to-date browser support for front-end web technologies on desktop and mobile web browsers.
author: thomaslombart

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search Can I Use
commands.description: Get browser support for front-end web technologies on desktop and mobile

preferences.name: showReleaseDate
preferences.description: Show browser release date next to version number
preferences.label: Show release date

preferences.name: showPartialSupport
preferences.description: Show version number and release date (if enabled) for partial supported browsers
preferences.label: Show partial support details

preferences.name: briefMode
preferences.description: Abbreviate feature status and shorten description
preferences.label: Brief Mode

preferences.name: defaultQuery
preferences.description: Default Browserlist query when no project is configured
preferences.title: Default Query

preferences.name: path
preferences.description: Path to project configured with Browserlist
preferences.title: Project path

preferences.name: environment
preferences.description: Environment to use in the Browserlist configuration (e.g production, modern, etc.)
preferences.title: Environment

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
